data.title: Should have listened to Yelp!
data.text: The quantity of food was huge, the flavor was weak and the order taker seemed unable to understand English.  I ordered General Tso's chicken and my son wanted Sesame chicken.  The online menu listed "Crispy Chicken (Sesame Chicken)" so that's what I ordered.  My General Tso's chicken was dry with well coated pieces of chicken but no extra sauce, it was very dry.  My son's "Sesame" Crispy chicken was just breaded chicken and sweet and sour sauce.  I even said I wanted the Sesame chicken or Crispy chicken, she repeated back to me the sesame chicken and we got Sweet and Sour.  Good thing my son likes S&S chicken.  Too bad he wanted something else.

data.title: Perfect
data.text:
I have been going here for 20 plus years. I moved out of state- yet Li still knows exactly what I want. They have an extensive menu,and the quality AND quantity are excellent. 
Anyplace where I can enter through the kitchen ( which is spotless) is alright by me! 
The only drawback is cash only. 
Enjoy!
